original_text: Please fill their land with many good things. Lord who appeared in the burning bush, please be kind to them. Please bless Joseph's descendants. He became a leader, separate from his brothers. May this blessing be like a crown on his head! Please fill their land with many good things. Please fill their land with many good things.
korean_text: 땅의 선물과 거기 충만한 것과 가시떨기나무 가운데에 계시던 이의 은혜로 말미암아 복이 요셉의 머리에, 그의 형제 중 구별한 자의 정수리에 임할지로다

sentences.original_text: like a crown on his head
